name: Freshsales CRM
description: Integrate with Freshsales CRM to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Contacts
tools.description: List contacts from Freshsales CRM with optional filtering and pagination.

tools.name: Create Contact
tools.description: Create a new contact in Freshsales CRM. Provide at least an email or last name.

tools.name: List Deals
tools.description: List deals from Freshsales CRM with optional filtering and pagination.

tools.name: Create Deal
tools.description: Create a new deal in Freshsales CRM. Provide at least a name.

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Search across Freshsales CRM entities (contacts, deals, accounts, etc.) by keyword.
